alert.note: Alert for Boone County Except Southwest; Boone County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 02 at 12:26PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Boone County through 100 PM CST... At 1225 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Rule, or 8 miles southeast of Berryville, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Harrison... Bergman... Omaha... Myrtle... Capps... Self... Red Bank... Alpena... Batavia... Bear Creek Springs... New Hope in Boone County... Hopewell in Boone County... Ridgeway... Burlington... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Boone County Except Southwest; Boone County Higher Elevations
